title: Save Over $300 on Access to 1TB of Secure Cloud Storage
description: Reliability and security are at the core of FolderFort, and the service runs in any modern browser on PC, Mac, or mobile—no installation required.
content:
If you’re tired of paying monthly fees for cloud storage, FolderFort’s 1TB Cloud Storage Pro Plan is available for a one-time payment of $79.99 (MSRP: $399). With it, you’ll have secure, always-on storage for files, backups, and projects without worrying about renewals.

The service runs in any modern browser on PC, Mac, or mobile—no installation required. Its intuitive interface makes it simple to organize files, create unlimited workspaces, and grant access to as many collaborators as you want. Each added user even receives 1GB of personal storage free of charge. Sharing is equally straightforward, with options for public or restricted links.

Reliability and security are at the core of FolderFort. With 99.99% uptime guaranteed and storage powered by Backblaze encryption, your data remains protected while still accessible at high speed. You can scale up if your needs grow or downgrade if you don't need as much space, all without downtime.

At just $79.99 (reg. $399), this FolderFort offer provides a cost-effective alternative to subscription-based cloud services.

Prices subject to change. PCMag editors select and review products independently. If you buy through affiliate links, we may earn commissions, which help support our testing.
summary: F's 1TB Cloud Storage Pro Plan is available for a single payment of $79.99 (ISP), allowing users to secure always-on storage for files, backups, and projects without worrying about renewing. The service runs in any modern browser on PC, Mac, or mobile and can be expanded to accommodate multiple users. It also offers 99.99% uptime and is powered by Backblaze encryption.
shortSummary: Federicially known as "Festival" is available for $79.99 for a one-time payment, offering secure, on-demand cloud storage with 99.99% uptime and security.

scraped_sources.text:
Fast, Reliable, and Affordable Cloud Data Storage
FolderFort is a user-friendly, high-speed cloud storage service that offers secure file storage and access from any modern browser on PC, Mac, or mobile devices—no installations needed. With FolderFort, you can efficiently manage and share your digital content in a professional yet approachable environment.
Simplified experience
-
1TB storage: Get more than enough storage from the get-go!
-
Simple & intuitive user interface: Seamlessly store and organize your files in the cloud, accessible anytime, anywhere
-
Unlimited workspaces: Make as many workspaces as you want and share with as many people as you want
-
Unlimited users: Add as many people as you want to access your files, folders, or workspaces. No need for them to pay, plus they get their own 1GB personal storage free
-
Share your files & folders
- Create links to folders & files to grant quick access for anyone
- Create Public links, or restrict access to certain users
-
Cross-platform accessibility: Access your files anytime, anywhere, on any device or platform, including PC, Mac, and mobile, through any modern browser. Whether you're on the go or at your desk, your files are always available!
Cloud scalability
-
Need more space? Upgrade anytime without downtime. Simply upgrade the account and your increased storage will be instant
-
Need to downgrade? Easy! Just reach out to support
Guaranteed security
FolderFort uses one of the world’s leaders in cloud storage, Backblaze, to provide robust encryption, blazing-fast speeds, and unlimited expansion. All files are secured using BackBlaze encryption upon upload. So you know your data is not accessible to bad actors.
Always accessible
-
Cross-platform accessibility: Access your files across multiple devices & platforms via any modern web browser
-
Blazing fast: With a strong internet connection, uploading large files takes seconds
FolderFort is very good
"FolderFort is very good. I bought a lifetime subscription offer in November 2024. Few features might be missing such as automatic sync, but they are very committed to their roadmap which eventually is going to add more features. So far I haven't noticed any issues, or anything else that would have forced me to look for another cloud provider."
Heavy usage over time review
"After some very heavy usage, I can say that Folder Fort is extremely fast ( I travel frequently and the velocity is always great). Web interface is very lightweight and easy to use, file and folder management is very simple as it should be, and sharing is extremely simple and reliable. Only thing missing is a desktop or phone app, instead of a purely web based solution. But I understand the logistics of that as well, so higher price and less stability would be the trade off. Very happy overall, great value and performance."
A good deal!
"As someone who uses cloud storage for personal file storage, I find the UI to be clean, not busy, and easy to move around in. The up/down load speeds are also good. A good deal!"

argos_summary: FolderFort offers a 1TB cloud storage plan for a one‑time fee of $79.99, providing secure, always‑on storage without monthly renewals. The service runs in any modern browser, supports unlimited workspaces and users, and gives each added user 1GB of free personal storage. It guarantees 99.99% uptime, uses Backblaze encryption, and allows easy scaling up or down. Users praise its speed, lightweight interface, and value, though some note the lack of desktop or mobile apps and missing automatic sync features.
